description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a vector database with keyword search capabilities, loads data, and performs a search query.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base loaded from PDF URLs, utilizing vector database for search.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database interface, supporting search operations.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data, with options to recreate and upsert.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a keyword-based search in the vector database.
